roles.roleDescription: You must act and play like an Imposter. Fake tasks, follow people. Act kinda sus bro...
Make them feel the wrath of an angry space officer. Everyone is sus, and you will make sure they know about it...
Did you do medbay? or was it reactor refueling? Wait.. can you fix lights in navigation? You arent sure what youve done...
No speaking! No Typing! You are a quiet, busy little crewmate...
Nothing gets past you. You keep a tidy and orderly ship. You must patrol the ship after every completed task.
